mapper.sql: pri_no.id AS pri_no_id, pri_no.member_id AS pri_no_member_id, pri_no.title AS pri_no_title, pri_no.is_read AS pri_no_is_read, pri_no.time AS pri_no_time, pri_no.access_range AS pri_no_access_range, pri_no.content AS pri_no_content, pri_no.to_member_id AS pri_no_to_member_id, pri_no.noti_type AS pri_no_noti_type
mapper.select:
select
from private_notification pri_no INNER JOIN member mem ON mem.id = noti.member_id where pri_no.id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO private_notification (member_id, title, is_read, time, access_range, content, to_member_id, noti_type) VALUES (#{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isRead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{time}, #{accessRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, #{toMemberId}, #{notiType})

insert into private_notification
member_id,
to_member_id,
title,
is_read,
time,
access_range,
content,
noti_type ,

mapper.update:
update private_notification
member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
to_member_id = #{toMemberId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_read = #{isRead,jdbcType=INTEGER},
time = #{time},
access_range = #{accessRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
noti_type = #{notiType},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

UPDATE private_notification SET member_id = #{memberId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_read = #{isRead,jdbcType=INTEGER}, noti_type = #{notiType}, time = #{time}, access_range = #{accessRange,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR}, to_member_id = #{toMemberId} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
